About the Company: North Eastern Carrying Corporation Limited (NECC) is one of the high performance transporting companies in India. It headquartered in Delhi. NECC offers wide range of transport related services. They book retail consignment, full truckload consignments, project consignments and Over Dimensional Consignments [ODC]. They also provide the storage facilities at delivery points for certain products like Retail Booking of small consignment, Full Truck Load service, Over Dimensional Consignments, Containerized movement of cargo, Door to Door service, Storage facilities for specified cargo.
